page.title: 13Stan's Coaches
page.content: This is a family firm, founded in 1973 with two 12 seater mini-buses. Stan now owns 4 Bedford coaches, each able to hold 60 people. The oldest was built in 1972, the newest in 1980.They cost around Â£15000. All 4 coaches are used every day. They run on deisel and do about 10 miles per gallon. The monthly fuel bill is Â£900. Stan has the contract for transporting school children at Great Totham Primary and The Plume School Maldon. He has had this contract since 1972. He employs 4 male drivers. In addition Stan Porter Senior operates a paper delivery service for Totham and Braxted. He employs only paper boys who work approximately 1 hour a day and earn Â£4.00 a week.
